Segment.name: ZT
Segment.comment: To transmit identity and reference information of the waybill being requested

Field.name: WaybillRequestCode
Field.comment: To identify the type of waybill request

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: WaybillNumber
Field.comment: Carrier accounting number of the waybill for the inbound movement

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: EquipmentNumberCheckDigit
Field.comment: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ZT04 or ZT05 is present, then the other is required.
